param-doc.name: workingDirectory
param-doc.p: Directory where to run the script. By default the working directory of AlvisNLP.

param-doc.name: environment
param-doc.p: Additional variable values to pass to the script's environment.

param-doc.name: conda
param-doc.p: Path to the conda executable for running the script under a conda environment. If this parameter is not set, then the script is not run in a conda environment. If this parameter is set, then condaEnvironment must be set.

param-doc.name: condaEnvironment
param-doc.p: Name of the conda environment in which the script must be run. This parameter is ignored if conda is not set.

param-doc.name: alvisnlpPythonDirectory
param-doc.p: Directory where the AlvisNLP Python library is found. In principle this parameter is set by default during AlvisNLP install.

param-doc.name: python
param-doc.p: Path to the python executable. By default, let the PATH environment determine the location of the Python executable.
